title: Three Strikes

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Throw a baseball at someone, short circuiting them. If they visit you tonight, this ability fails.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players who don't have Hellbent defense have Hellbent 3 defense (they can't be killed by attacks, but take 1 damage whenever they're visited, and die once they've taken 3 or more damage or are lynched).
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__

desc:
Post 4663
*So like my boyfriend punched me like really hard in the stomach and also he's a boxer. So like that's strike 1 and if he does it two more times I think I'm maybe gonna break up with him*
None/Hellbent 3
